Class Picture

  • java.lang.Object
    • SimplePicture
      • Picture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DigitalPicture
    public class Picture
extends SimplePicture
    A class that represents a picture. This class inherits from SimplePicture and allows the student to add functionality to the Picture class. based on work by Barbara Ericson ericson@cc.gatech.edu
    Author:
    Anthony Rubick

      mirror the arms on the snowman (“snowman.jpg”) to make a snowman with 4 arms.

      mirror the seagull (“seagull.jpg”) to the right so that there are two seagulls on the beach near each other

      mirrors a picture around a mirror placed horizontally from top to bottom.

      mirrors a picture around a mirror placed horizontally from bottom to top.

    • Method Detail

      • removeColorChannels

        public void removeColorChannels​(boolean removeRed,
                                boolean removeGreen,
                                boolean removeBlue)
        remove, remove one or more color channels by setting the values to 0
        Parameters:
        removeRed - whether or not to remove Red
        removeGreen - whether or not to remove Green
        removeBlue - whether or not to remove Blue

      • trimColor

        public void trimColor​(int color,
                      int min,
                      int max)
        Trim, trims a color channel to be in between the passed min and max values
        Parameters:
        color - an integer representing the color to be trimmed (0 = red; 1 = green; 2 = blue)
        min - the minimum value, any color values below this will be increased to this value
        max - the maximum value, any color values above this will be decreased to this value

      • negateColorChannels

        public void negateColorChannels​(boolean negateRed,
                                boolean negateGreen,
                                boolean negateBlue)
        Negate, negates one or more color channels by setting the values to 255 - current value
        Parameters:
        negateRed - whether or not to negate Red
        negateGreen - whether or not to negate Green
        negateBlue - whether or not to negate Blue

      • replaceColorWithColor

        public void replaceColorWithColor​(Color colorToReplace,
                                  Color colorToSet,
                                  int tolerance)
        relaceColorWithColor, parses the picture, setting all pixels of the passed colorToReplace to the passed colorToSet
        Parameters:
        colorToReplace - the color to replace
        colorToSet - the color to replace with
        tolerance - (FUTURE) will allow the user to set a tolerance, replacing all colors within this distance of colorToReplace

        Returns:
